Class dom.id.SessionViewID 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----dom.id.DObjectID
           |
           +----dom.id.SessionViewID
public class SessionViewID
extends DObjectID
implements Serializable
Class to represent a sessionViews's (local view of distributed session) unique identification. Includes a) a unique number for a particular local 'view' of a session; b) An URL, which can be used as an external reference to the session view this id represents (for access to entering/leaving group) NOTE: This id is opaque, so it could be replaced by, say, a SturdyRef.

Default constructor.

Make a copy of an existing SessionViewID

Another version of above.

SessionViewID 
 public SessionViewID()
Default constructor. myURL is set to null. The SessionViewID in this case does not include name information contained in the url field.

SessionViewID 
 public SessionViewID(URL theURL)
Normal constructor.

Parameters:
an - URL that identifies this session view.
SessionViewID 
 public SessionViewID(String anURL) throws MalformedURLException
Another version of above.

Parameters:
a - String representing an url for this session view
Throws: MalformedURLException
is thrown if the string does not identify a valid URL.
SessionViewID 
 public SessionViewID(URL base,
                      String name) throws IOException
Yet another version to make the construction easy.

Parameters:
base - an URL that identifies the session view
name - the name of the session view
Throws: MalformedURLException
if a proper URL cannot be constructed from the given value
